headline: The 0.04% Fee ETF That Turned $10,000 Into Over $35,000 Like Magic
summary: When value stocks fall out of favor, investors panic. When they outperform, they feel vindicated. The real question: what role does a value ETF play when the market stops rewarding momentum and starts caring about fundamentals? Vanguard Value Index Fund ETF Shares (NYSEARCA:VTV) captures that shift. It holds over 300 large-cap U.S. companies trading at ... The 0.04% Fee ETF That Turned $10,000 Into Over $35,000 Like Magic

headline: JPM sees dour demand outlook for China automakers, downgrades Li Auto
summary: Investing.com -- JPMorgan downgraded Li Auto to underweight, warning that slowing demand, rising costs and policy uncertainty could weigh on the Chinese carmakers in 2026. Shares of Li Auto were down 3.4% in Monday premarket trading.

headline: SoFi or PayPal: J.P. Morgan Selects the Superior Fintech Stock to Buy
summary: Fintech stocks continue to draw investor interest because they sit at the intersection of two durable growth areas – finance and technology. Over the past few years, advances in AI and cloud infrastructure have accelerated innovation across the tech landscape, and financial platforms are increasingly adopting these tools to improve efficiency, personalization, and scale. headline: America’s oldest bank bets big on AI
summary: America’s oldest bank is going all in on AI. BNY spends nearly $4 billion a year on technology, or about 19 percent of its revenue – a proportion far higher than any of its big-bank peers. But the big concern around the bank industry’s AI spending right now is what the return will be. CNBC’s Leslie Picker dives into BNY’s latest AI efforts and what it could mean for the future of the firm.

headline: Why The Narrative Around Informa (LSE:INF) Is Shifting After New Analyst Updates
summary: Informa's updated fair value estimate has shifted only marginally, with a slightly higher price target reflecting small tweaks to revenue and discount rate assumptions rather than a change in the overall view of the business. Analysts remain split between more upbeat Overweight calls and a Neutral stance, and that tension is keeping most price targets clustered within a fairly tight band. Continue with this article to see how you can keep on top of these incremental narrative shifts before...
